name: UITargetedDragPreview
desc: A drag item preview used by the system during lift, drop, or cancellation animation.

items.name: init(for: URL, target: UIDragPreviewTarget)
items.desc: Initializes a new targeted drag item preview with a URL and a drag item preview.

items.name: init(for: URL, title: String?, target: UIDragPreviewTarget)
items.desc: Initializes a new targeted drag item preview with a URL, a title, and a drag item preview.

items.name: func retargetedPreview(with: UIDragPreviewTarget) -> UITargetedDragPreview
items.desc: Returns a new targeted drag item preview based on an existing one, but with a new geometric target.
